mdRecord.dcterms:title: New River Valley Symphony Fall Concert
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for New River Valley Symphony Fall Concert. Featured Soloist: David Widder, Clarinet. Programs: Don Giovanni Overture, Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart | Variations for Clarinet and Orchestra, Gioacchino Rossini | Premiere Rhapsodie, Claude Debussy | Symphony No. 2, Howard Hanson.
